Text: Strange crop formation spottedMost of you have heard or seen pictures of strange crop formations in England Similar formations are now cropping up in Texas While flying over the Hlavinka family farm east Brookshire Texas I spotted a strange crop formation in a rice field I believe this to be undistputed proof that there is intellegent life making strange crop formations Kenneth Hlavinka and Brian Hlavinka created this crop formation Originally the design was to be photographed from the dryers at the bottom of the photo but an ariel shot of the formation makes for a nice view
